content: This reminds me of how Obama and Valerie Jarrett could never have a private conversation because the transcripts always showed up online “leaked” from some insider. Oh … wait. That never actually happened. Trump is like an organ transplant lobbed into DC by the American people, but they forgot to inject the corrupt body politic with a good dose of immunosuppressants to stop the body politic from rejecting its new organ and killing the hose.
